Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students needing to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone connecting the two students that uses sound to send or receive information.
The student can clearly show how sound travels through the string in the telephone design.
The student can incorporate details showing how the string telephone solves the communication problem.
The student can add any extra elements to show how communicating over long distances helps people.
